title: Missing many purchased champions
body:
I recently discovered I'm missing many of the champions I purchased.  Why and how do I get this fixed?  I even have recently purchased skins for champions that I now don't even have.  Which is of course impossible if you didn't own the champion.  Below is a list of the champions that I am missing from my account that I previously purchased.  

Quinn
Kogmaw-  Bought Skin
Malzahar
Morgana
Miss Fortune
Zilean
Trist- Bought Skin
Viegar
Sona
Blitz
Ezreal

replies.body:
Hey Boar,

Shin is correct, it looks like your account was flagged for fraudulent activity. You can find more information about this in [this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/gfX587IW-champsskins-i-was-gifted-are-gone-where-did-they-go). If you have any questions, you can [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

Hey there,
Recently Riot audited accounts involved in fraud, your account's content was most likely removed in relation to that.
If you want more info i recommend sending in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot.
